channel.title: Dragon Pl8body glitch? goes into weapon slot [317]
channel.description:
Hey there is a glitch with d pl8 on my server i really wanna fix it, here's a screen shot.
[IMG]http://i264.photobucket.com/albums/ii181/woodcuttersam/ScreenshotStudiocapture16.png[/img]
If Anyone can help me it will be much appreciated :D

item.source: Dragon Pl8body glitch? goes into weapon slot [317]

item.title: Dragon Pl8body glitch? goes into weapon slot [317]
item.dc:creator: @xxpkpurexx xxpkpurexx
item.description:
@xxpkpurexx wrote:

ok wut u do is go to class 8 files press ctrl. (f) then type dragon platebody
something will pop up like this find that part do u c it says wield change it to wear

class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;//New option

for example like this under me u c then compile server and spawn it agian and wear it, it wont wear as a weapon kk?

class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;//New option

if this helped can u rep me and if it didnt post another comment or send me a message kk?

Read full topic

Skillapwnz:

thx guys! it fixed! thx for letting me know that u have to add it to 2 things platebody and body :rolleyes:

You’re welcome.
For future referrence: Not a guy

item.title: Dragon Pl8body glitch? goes into weapon slot [317]
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“Skillapwnz, post:8, topic:307546”][quote author=DemisePking link=topic=403676.msg2988955#msg2988955 date=1255192369]
you need to go into item.java and add the id of your dragon platebody to the body section AND the platebody section
/thread
[/quote] i already checked that.

Add it into Public Int body, as well…

What do i search in my client.java for public int body? i searched public int body nothing.[/quote]
Not in client.java. Geez kid.
Item4.java or Item.java. Idk what base you’re using. -.-"

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Pl8body glitch? goes into weapon slot [317]
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

[quote=“Skillapwnz, post:5, topic:307546”]i never found any d plate in the client.java but i found the id of my d plate idk if this matters?

public int[] statId = { 10252, 11000, 10253, 11001, 10254, 11002, 10255,
11011, 11013, 11014, 11010, 11012, 11006, 11009, 11008, 11004,
11003, 11005, 47002, 54090, 11007 };

thats all what i found in client.java that has to do with d plate [/quote]no… There is a specific class where you add ints into for customs.

item.title: Dragon Pl8body glitch? goes into weapon slot [317]
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

Skilla, try this…

Go into the client folder where you add customs, and use ‘ctr + f’ to bring up find menu, then type ‘dragon platebody’ and check the item it is replacing in your case is 11013, now replace it with a item that actually wields to your body.

Read full topic
